feed.title: libcoin (HEAD) now supports boost < 1.47 - please test

entry.title: libcoin (HEAD) now supports boost < 1.47 - please test
entry.summary: Michael Gronager, Director of Ceptacle, has added a simplified fall back class to the boost::asio::signal_set for compilation on platforms with less than bleeding edge versions of Boost. The update will enable compilation on most currently deployed Linux systems that use Boost 1.42. The root CMakeLists.txt has also been updated to only require version 1.42. Although the changes work for Michael, he acknowledges that committers' machines may have intrinsic magic that hides actual errors. Michael encourages testing and feedback regarding the updates. Contact information for Michael and Ceptacle can be found in his signature.
